item.title: Bootstrapping from DNS SRV records in Java
item.description: I know this topic has a very narrow audience, but I hope that one or two people out there scratching their heads will benefit from it. Here’s the itch we’re trying to scratch: is there an easy way to determine hostnames for - let’s say - a database connection? There are many ways to do this, like hardcoding it, providing them through a properties file and so on. All this techniques (maybe aside from fetching it over the network from a central storage) require some modifications on the server once one of the hostnames changes.
